Instruction: In a saucepan, combine sour cherries, sugar, water, and lemon juice.
Place the saucepan over medium heat and bring the mixture to a simmer.
Reduce the heat to low and let the compote cook for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cherries have softened and the mixture has thickened.
Remove the saucepan from heat and let the sour cherry compote cool slightly.
Transfer the compote to a jar or container and refrigerate until ready to serve.
